meta.title: Netapp | Case Study
meta.description: Aviso’s Conversational Intelligence Provided Robust X-Ray for NetApp Sellers to Increase Customer Engagement

content.subtitle: CASE STUDY
content.title: Aviso’s Conversational Intelligence Provided Robust X-Ray for NetApp Sellers to Increase Customer Engagement AI Forecasting and Deal Signals

content.subtitle: TECHNOLOGY
content.description: Founded in 1992 and headquartered in Sunnyvale, CA, NetApp is a hybrid cloud data services and data management company

items.title: The key was conversational intelligence. We could look at calls that our reps were doing with customers or channel partners or even some of our sellers, and learn from those calls because, of course, everything is digitized immediately, which is great
items.description: Lori Harmon, VP, Global Sales, NetApp

content.title: NetApp was in search of an AI solution that would help enhance customer engagement and internal training and growth of their sales reps

items.title: Challenges Faced
items.description:
• Few insights into customer conversations and expensive call recording tool (Gong)
  • Over reliance on spreadsheets
  • Deal reviews on adhoc basis
  • Ineffective CRM use leading to poor customer engagement
  • No AI in training of sales teams
items.icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="h-6 w-6" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke="currentColor"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M19 20H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h10a2 2 0 012 2v1m2 13a2 2 0 01-2-2V7m2 13a2 2 0 002-2V9a2 2 0 00-2-2h-2m-4-3H9M7 16h6M7 8h6v4H7V8z" /></svg>

items.title: Solution Provided
items.description:
• Conversational Intelligence insights for sales reps
  • Forecasting Insights for different sales teams
  • Sales Activity tracking all active opportunities
  • Deal and Pipeline insights
  • Coaching Insights
  • Virtual Selling via Deal & Collaboration Rooms
items.icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="h-6 w-6" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke="currentColor"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 21a4 4 0 01-4-4V5a2 2 0 012-2h4a2 2 0 012 2v12a4 4 0 01-4 4zm0 0h12a2 2 0 002-2v-4a2 2 0 00-2-2h-2.343M11 7.343l1.657-1.657a2 2 0 012.828 0l2.829 2.829a2 2 0 010 2.828l-8.486 8.485M7 17h.01" /></svg>

content.title: Benefits for NetApp
content.description: NetApp was in search of an AI solution that would help enhance customer engagement and internal training and growth of their sales reps

items.title: Reduced spend on both Gong and other CRM point solutions to reinvest in business
AI-powered Coaching of sellers for effective virtual selling during COVID transition
New customer objections clarified and resolved via Keywords and Smart Transcripts
Increased manager visibility with insights for sales rep and sales team advancement
Increased level of customer engagement via Activity mapping to discover where and when customers are best responding to sales outreach
